alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 12:16AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Henry, northern Butts and southwestern Newton Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1216 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Rocky Plains, or 9 miles south of Covington, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Covington, Porterdale, Oak Hill and Rocky Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
